name: OpenMageModuleFostering/Exclusiveconcepts_Conversionsondemand
description: Conversions On Demand is designed to prevent shoppers from leaving your site before making a purchase. Years of testing and data analysis power each application we make available through Conversions On Demand. The Conversions On Demand Suite includes a The Daily Deal Bar, The Cart Closer, and Time2Buy. All 3 are available separately or in combination to improve your store's conversion rate.
